extracted_playbook.title: Contact Schneider Electric for Fix
extracted_playbook.description: Contact the local Service Representative or Schneider Electric Process Automation Global Customer Support Center to download and install the fix for the vulnerability in FoxRTU Station version 9.3.0.

extracted_playbook.title: Encrypt and Password Protect Project Files
extracted_playbook.description: Follow instructions in Chapter 12 of User Guide B0780AE rev. P to encrypt and password protect project files.

extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate Patches in Test Environment
extracted_playbook.description: Use back-ups and evaluate the impact of patches in a Test and Development environment or on an offline infrastructure before applying them to live systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Schneider Electric for Patch Removal Assistance
extracted_playbook.description: Contact Schneider Electric's Customer Care Center for assistance in removing a patch.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement File System Access Control
extracted_playbook.description: Implement proper file system access control restrictions to prevent unauthorized users from editing FoxRTU Station project files or placing malicious DLLs in accessible directories.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Project File Storage
extracted_playbook.description: Store project files in secure storage and restrict access to only trusted users. Encrypt project files when stored and only open project files received from trusted sources.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Project File Integrity
extracted_playbook.description: Compute a hash of the project files and regularly check the consistency of this hash to verify integrity before usage.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow Cybersecurity Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Follow workstation, network, and site-hardening guidelines in the Recommended Cybersecurity Best Practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Social Engineering Protections
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
